=head1 NAME

DiaColloDB::WWW::Handler::cgi - diachronic collocation db, www wrappers: cgi handler

=pod

=head1 SYNOPSIS

 use DiaColloDB::WWW::Handler::cgi;

 $h = $class_or_obj->new(%options);

=cut

##========================================================================
## DESCRIPTION
=pod

=head1 DESCRIPTION

DiaColloDB::WWW::Handler::cgi
provides a
L<DiaColloDB::WWW::Handler|DiaColloDB::WWW::Handler>-compliant class
for handling CGI-like requests
via L<DiaColloDB::WWW::CGI|DiaColloDB::WWW::CGI>.

=cut

##----------------------------------------------------------------
## DESCRIPTION: DiaColloDB::WWW::Handler: globals
=pod

=head2 Globals

=over 4

=item Variable: @ISA

DiaColloDB::WWW::Handler::cgi inherits from
L<DiaColloDB::WWW::Handler|DiaColloDB::WWW::Handler>.

=back

=cut


##----------------------------------------------------------------
## DESCRIPTION: DiaColloDB::WWW::Handler::cgi: Methods
=pod

=head2 Methods

=over 4

=item new

 $h = $class_or_obj->new(%options);

%options, %$h:

 template  => $ttkfile,          ##-- ttk template for instantiation (REQUIRED)

=item run

 $rsp = $h->run($server, $clientConn, $httpRequest);

Handles a CGI-like server request using
a temporary L<DiaColloDB::WWW::CGI|DiaColloDB::WWW::CGI> object
to instantiate the specified C<$h-E<gt>{template}> using the query parameters
parsed from the L<HTTP::Request|HTTP::Request> object C<$httpRequest>.

=back

=cut
